sn6.8:3.1: 8. Katamodakatissasutta
sn6.8:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā divāvihāragato hoti paṭisallīno.
sn6.8:4.3: Atha kho subrahmā ca paccekabrahmā suddhāvāso ca paccekabrahmā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn6.8:4.5: Atha kho suddhāvāso paccekabrahmā katamodakatissakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhagavato santike imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
